text: Hockey Homicide is a cartoon. It was made by Walt Disney Productions in 1945, featuring Goofy. ==Home media== The short was released on December 2, 2002, on Walt Disney Treasures: The Complete Goofy. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1945 comedy movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Goofy Category:Ice hockey movies Category:Short movies
title: Hockey Homicide
